title: Student journalists rise to an unprecedented challenge
description: This fall, I’ve been immersed in news about higher education. I typically report about drug policy, but I signed on to co-edit a weekly newsletter out of the Columbia Journalism School, where I teach, that covers the Trump administration’s assault on colleges and universities across the country. It’s called CollegeWatch. For this job, I am...
